title: Banana almond-flaxseed pancakes
ingredients: ['100g wholemeal flour', '35g ground almonds', '2 tablespoons milled flaxseeds', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '250ml almond milk', '2 bananas, mashed', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon butter']
